comment.realname: I want the old flickr back
comment.author: 31504334@N08
comment._content: One of the fleet of J Hampson of Oswestry. They operated a town service until the 1980s. Other photos of Hampson's buses here.

comment.author: 82967752@N00
comment._content: Dispute? It just looks like the bus queue to me. Are you sure this is the correct translation?

comment.author: 82967752@N00
comment._content: I think the little girls in berets and beautiful coats must have been going to Bellan House or Queen's Park, both private schools. Oswestry Girls' High didn't have berets unless you were in the 6th form, and wore gabardine macs. I think the boy at the end of the queue was probably going to Oswestry Boys' High, in which case the stripes on his grey socks were green.
